column1: echo ¦curl¦-SL "http://memcached.org/files/memcached-$MEMCACHED_VERSION.tar.gz" -o memcached.tar.gz && echo "$MEMCACHED_SHA1 memcached.tar.gz" | sha1sum -c - && mkdir -p /usr/src/memcached && tar -xzf memcached.tar.gz -C /usr/src/memcached --str... :: Filesystem_operation

echo ¦set¦-x # && apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends # && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* && mkdir -p /usr/src/redis && curl -sSL "$REDIS_DOWNLOAD_URL" -o redis.tar.gz && echo "$REDIS_DOWNLOAD_SHA1 *redis.tar.gz"... :: Filesystem_operation
